note.p: Daughter of Robert Waring of Wilford, Nottinghamshire, and his wife Anne (later Anne Lascelles). Married William Darwin (1655–82) in 1680. Mother of William Darwin (1681–1760) and Robert Darwin (1682–1754), and grandmother of Erasmus Darwin (1731–1802). As a widow, lived at Elston Hall with her mother and sons.
‘The Darwins & Elston Hall’, Elston Heritage Project, elstonheritage.org.uk (accessed 23 November 2018)
